features: One 6-count pack of BIC EasyRinse Anti-Clogging Men's Disposable Razors for a smoother shave with less irritation*
Each pack contains up to 90 shaves so you can get the most out of your razors
Breakthrough anti-clogging blade technology results in up to 60 percent less time rinsing** and up to 25 percent less strokes needed***
Easy Rinse shaving razors with four longer-lasting*, titanium-coated blades for a close and comfortable shave, plus dual lubricating strips enriched with aloe vera and vitamin E for enhanced glide
Precision edging blade on the back of these men's razors for shaving to get to all those hard-to-reach areas
o Whether it's coarse, long or pesky, your BIC EasyRinse Shaver for men is ready for any situation and any and all hair types — great razor for face and body use
body.description: Say goodbye to constant blade clogging and enjoy a smoother shave with BIC EasyRinse Men's Disposable Razors. BIC EasyRinse grooming products for men feature patented anti-clogging technology designed with the optimal amount of space between the blades for easy rinsing and less clogging and irritation. Each pack contains up to 90 shaves so you can get the most out of your razors. This six-pack of EasyRinse disposable shaving razors for men is a great choice for a faster** shave — up to 60 percent less time rinsing** and up to 25 percent less strokes needed***. Each EasyRinse disposable shaver boasts four longer-lasting*, titanium-coated blades, a pivoting head and dual lubricating strips enriched with aloe vera and vitamin E. Shaving shouldn't be frustrating, so the BIC EasyRinse men's razor for shaving makes it easier to tame any unwanted scruff, even long or coarse hair. Plus, this slim portable razor can slip easily into travel shaver kits or gym bags for a fantastic shave — whenever, wherever. Experience breakthrough technology at a price you are sure to love with BIC EasyRinse Disposable Razors for men — designed for a smooth, effortless shave with less rinsing, skin irritation and clogging. *Vs. BIC Sensitive. **Vs. BIC Flex 3. ***Vs. BIC Flex 5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: I used these things for quite a while, each razor lasts about 5-6 uses before the blades start to slightly ware down. Compared to regular razors they are extremely easy to rinse out. With other razors it takes me around 5 minutes to rinse, takes maybe around 20 seconds to rinse these bad boys out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding disposable razor.
reviews.reviewText: The Bic razors with non-clog easy rinse blades are the best disposal razors I have ever used. I do not understand the negative reviews. There is nothing negative that I have experienced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The razor stays sharp for multiple shaves and you don’t spend all your time trying to rinse it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for weekly shavers
reviews.reviewText: If you shave at least once a week these are perfect. Smooth shave that rinses clean with no clogs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Edit: from 3 to 1 - Horrible Razors
reviews.reviewText: Update Again: Gave away all of the razors except two. Totally useless to me.Update/See my original review below - a 3-star rating. However, the more I use these the more I realize they clog more than my old razors. I also have to make twice as many passes over each part of my face to get all the hairs/stubble. Luckily, they don't irritate my skin. These are horrible razors, especially for the price. Don't bother.These are great razors, don't get me wrong. Smooth, gentle shave with a large head and easy-grip handle. Very ergonomic. However, after a few passes, the sides of the head were clogging up a bit--not as bad as typical razors, but these are supposed to be anti-clog. Also, it took several passes on my neck under the jaw line to get all of the hairs. So, while the razor is great--it's great like a lot of razors are great. It's not a special razor worth spending extra money on if you're on a budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Does not come with 4 blade refills, that is misleading, it has 4 razors in the blade
reviews.reviewText: I found this ad to be misleading as it says comes with 4 blades making you think 4 refill blades. It should say it has 4 blades on the razor not - it comes with 4 blades - have to wonder how many people were conned by this false advertising scam...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: 3 in a pack would be nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars NOT a smooth shave, not at all!
reviews.reviewText: We used this to shave legs which had not been shave in a couple of weeks. The hairs were easy to remove from the razor by swishing it in a bowl of water. Sadly, even going over the same areas multiple times did not produce a smooth shave. VERY DISAPPOINTED!

I’m shocked that I have to take time out of my day to write a review on a razor out of all things, but here we are. This razor does NOT work. In order to get this razor to slightly perform, you have to shave the opposite way of any normal razor (aka shave in the direction the hair grows, not against). Even when you do that, it does not provide a clean shave in any capacity. I have never had an issue with a razor before and do NOT recommend this. Save your money!
